src:
马股收窄跌幅 重返1600水平
06 Nov 2019, 05:24 by Surin Murugiah
（吉隆坡6日讯）截至早盘休市，富时隆综指收窄跌幅，并重返1600水平。
截至中午12点30分，富时隆综指跌6.34点，至1600.40点。稍早前，富时隆综指一度滑落至1597.18点低位。
下跌股327只，上升股211只，另有514只无起落。成交量13亿8000万股，值7亿6679万令吉。
下跌股有United Plantations Bhd、Petronas Gas Bhd、Top Glove Corp Bhd、KESM Industries Bhd、Time Dotcom Bhd、Dutch Lady Milk Industries Bhd、Petronas Chemicals Group Bhd、Hong Leong Bank Bhd、Yinson Holdings Bhd及IJM Corp Bhd。
热门股为Velesto Energy Bhd、Sumatec Resources Bhd、NetX Holdings Bhd、Karambunai Corp Bhd、KNM Group Bhd和Komarkcorp Bhd。
上升股包括Fraser & Neave Holdings Bhd、Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd、Allianz Malaysia Bhd、Nestle (M) Bhd、British American Tobacco (M) Bhd、Sunway Bhd、Chin Teck Plantations Bhd、Hong Leong Industries Bhd与Aeon Credit Service (M) Bhd。
路透社报导，大多数东南亚股市周三在低位徘徊，菲律宾股市在近期上涨之后领跌，因为投资者对中美贸易谈判的具体细节持谨慎态度。
中国要求美国取消9月实施的关税措施，作为中美“第一阶段”贸易协议的一部份内容。两国可能本月稍晚签署这项协议，签署地点尚未确定。
艾芬黄氏资本研究指出，目前技术指标以及马股走势均未显示逆转迹象。因此，券商仍然认为综指将在不久的将来重新测试1615水平。
“马股处于技术性反弹。”
（编译：魏素雯）

English version：KLCI pares loss to reclaim 1,600 level as regional markets trade muted

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Malaysian stocks narrowed their losses and returned to the 1600 level
06 Nov 2019, 05:24 by Surin Murugiah
KUALA LUMPUR (Jan 6) As of the close of the trading session, the FBM KLCI narrowed its decline and returned to the 1600 level.
As of 12:30, the FTSE KLCI fell 6.34 points to 1600.40 points. Earlier, the FBM KLCI once slipped to a low of 1597.18.
There were 327 stocks falling, 211 stocks rose, and 514 had no ups and downs. The volume was 1.38 billion shares, valued at 760.67 million ringgit.
Falling stocks include United Plantations Bhd, Petronas Gas Bhd, Top Glove Corp Bhd, KESM Industries Bhd, Time Dotcom Bhd, Dutch Lady Milk Industries Bhd, Petronas Chemicals Group Bhd, Hong Leong Bank Bhd, Yinson Holdings Bhd and IJM Corp Bhd.
Popular stocks are Velesto Energy Bhd, Sumatec Resources Bhd, NetX Holdings Bhd, Karambunai Corp Bhd, KNM Group Bhd and Komarkcorp Bhd.
Rising stocks include Fraser & Neave Holdings Bhd, Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd, Allianz Malaysia Bhd, Nestle (M) Bhd, British American Tobacco (M) Bhd, Sunway Bhd, Chin Teck Plantations Bhd, Hong Leong Industries Bhd and Aeon Credit Service (M ) Bhd.
Reuters reported that most Southeast Asian stock markets were at a low level on Wednesday, and the Philippine stock market led the decline after the recent gains as investors were cautious about the specific details of Sino-US trade negotiations.
China has asked the United States to cancel the tariff measures implemented in September as part of the "first phase" trade agreement between China and the United States. The two countries may sign the agreement later this month, and the signing location has not yet been determined.
Affin Huang’s Capital Research pointed out that the current technical indicators and the trend of the Malaysian stock market did not show signs of reversal. Therefore, brokers still believe that the KLCI will retest the 1615 level in the near future.
“The Malaysian stock market is in a technical rebound.”
(Compile: Wei Suwen)

English version:KLCI pares loss to reclaim 1,600 level as regional markets trade muted

Via theedgemarkets.com
